UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Anti-microbial activity and cell binding are controlled by sequence determinants in the anti-microbial peptide PR-39.
Literature.Author: Chan YR, Zanetti M, Gennaro R, Gallo RL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli D21(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=16µM),Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100(MIC=8µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM)
